description: Sembrando Confianza (Sowing Confidence) is an agro-ecological market initiated by the Colombian-French foundation Project Without Borders. Established in 2012, it connects small farmers from Bogotá, Cundinamarca, and Boyacá with consumers, promoting sustainable practices and fair pricing. The initiative focuses on selling fresh and processed products made by local farmers, fostering community support and environmental care. Through its online platform, Sowing Confidence aims to enhance food accessibility while empowering local producers.
name: Sembrando Confianza
